title: New: Chrome Sparks – My <3 EP
body: After releasing a combination of singles and remixes, **Chrome Sparks** dropped his new, fully original EP today. After coming relatively out of nowhere, it surprises as well as delivers when it comes to hip jerking, complex electro. **Jeremy Malvin** (Sparks) actually hooks up with blog favourite, **Steffaloo**, on two of the EP’s tracks. She gives the whole things a new dimension, combining with the stumbling and sharp beats to create something altogether more mellow and sedated. As a whole, the EP could be that much needed collection of summer jams. Stream and download the EP below. My <3 by Chrome Sparks
